{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = A Beagle Buddy Web Camera |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://beagleboard.org/leopard |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Leopard Imaging |model = LeopardBoard |submodelappend = yes |submodel = 355 |revision = Ver. 1.4 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = development board |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;TMS320 (DM355);TMS320DM355Z7E; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM926EJ-S |cpu1_type_rev = DaVinci |cpu1spd = <!-- 256 MHz / 1 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SLC NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;29F2G08AAD; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Micron;MT47H64M16HR-3:G; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Davicom;DM9000BEP; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 12 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port,, stereo plug connector |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header,, populated,, J1
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = SD Card slot, Component Video, Audio out (2.5 mm), Audio in (2.5mm), LCD/DVI, Camera 2MP, I2C, UART, GPIO |addchip = 3-5.5V Single-Channel RS-232 Line Driver/Receiver;TI;TRS3221E;;1;,,, USB Peripheral Power Management;TI;TPS2141;;1;,,, Low-Power Stereo Audio Codec;TI;TLV320AIC3104;;1;,,, 5-Channel Power Management IC;TI;TPS65053;;1;,,, Single 2-Input Positive AND Gate;TI;SN74LVC1G08;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 08/2009 |estprice = 84 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = USA
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Texas Instruments]] TMS320 (DM355) :ARM926EJ-S + DSP *Storage: 256B SLC NAND Flash, SD card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 128MB (DDR2) SDRAM *Network: 1x FE LAN ports *USB: 1x USB Mini (Host) ports *Power Source: 5V/1A barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://elinux.org/LeopardBoard ''LeopardBoard'' on '''Embedded Linux''' Wiki] *[https://www.planetanalog.com/two-low-cost-boards-from-leopard-imaging-with-ridgerun-software-enable-low-cost-development-of-video-and-vision-applications/ ''Two Low Cost Boards From Leopard Imaging'' on '''Planet Analog''']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:LeopardBoard 355 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:LeopardBoard 355 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:LeopardBoard Camera Top.jpeg|Camera Board Top File:LeopardBoard Camera Bottom.jpeg|Camera Board Bottom File:LeopardBoard 355.jpeg|With Camera </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
